services.name: Celebration Service
services.description: Four hours of worship, Word, ministry, and G12 activation every Sunday afternoon.

location: Casa Nieva Events Place, Biñan, Laguna 4024, Philippines

livestream.description: Can't join us in person? Watch our services live online.

g12Rhythms.title: Cell Celebration Night
g12Rhythms.description: House-to-house gatherings where every leader pastors their twelve with worship, testimonies, and activation.

g12Rhythms.title: Pre-Encounter Track
